source.guidance: We use **regular expressions** to match text. This is similar to, but different from **file globbing**, which is used specifically to match to a file name.
source.instructions: Click the button below to submit your response.
source.name: File Globbing
source.text: We use <<<regular expressions>>> to match text. This is similar to, but different from <<<file globbing>>>, which is used specifically to match to a file name.

text: to match text. This is similar to, but different from
